1.0.0.name: wordpress/kohana-for-wordpress
1.0.0.description:
Kohana for WordPress is a wordpress plugin that allows you to integrate PHP applications that use the Kohana 3.0 architecture with a wordpress site.

What is Kohana?

Kohana is a PHP 5 framework that aims to be secure, lightweight, and easy to use.

Requirements

Kohana for Wordpress has been built and tested using Wordpress 2.8 and Kohana 3.0

If you don't have Kohana 3.0 installed you can get it at the following link. http://dev.kohanaphp.com/projects/kohana3/files

Support

Get plugin support at http://forum.kohanaphp.com
